author: vors
body:
I originally used `deploy_script:` section for publishing artifacts.
This section is not invoked on Pull Requests.
Hence, use `on_finish` section instead, so we can consume artifacts from PRs as well.

comments.author: daviwil
comments.body: Nice!  Does this ZIP just contain binaries or does it contain nupkg files?

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Just zip for now, I will create nupkg per dll

title: Publish AppVeyor artifacts on PRs
